body_html:
@ezyang hello, Thanks for your reply! but I am definitely sure that my C++ code runs on the GPU. Because the executable file has linked into such deep learning acceleration libraries as cuda, cudnn , etc.

yang@yang:~/test/torch_deploy/Onnx2Aten/build$ ldd main 
	linux-vdso.so.1 =>  (0x00007ffe8f367000)
	libresnet18.so => /home/yang/test/torch_deploy/Onnx2Aten/lib/libresnet18.so (0x00007fcfe3b6c000)
	libATen_cuda.so => /home/yang/test/torch_deploy/Onnx2Aten/lib/libATen_cuda.so (0x00007fcfd636c000)
	libATen_cpu.so => /home/yang/test/torch_deploy/Onnx2Aten/lib/libATen_cpu.so (0x00007fcfd51db000)
	libstdc++.so.6 => /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6 (0x00007fcfd4e59000)
	libm.so.6 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libm.so.6 (0x00007fcfd4b50000)
	libgcc_s.so.1 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgcc_s.so.1 (0x00007fcfd493a000)
	libc.so.6 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6 (0x00007fcfd4570000)
	/lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 (0x00007fcfe3da3000)
	libdl.so.2 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libdl.so.2 (0x00007fcfd436c000)
	librt.so.1 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so.1 (0x00007fcfd4164000)
	libpthread.so.0 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0 (0x00007fcfd3f47000)
	libcusparse.so.8.0 => /usr/local/lib/libcusparse.so.8.0 (0x00007fcfd142c000)
	libcudnn.so.7 => /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcudnn.so.7 (0x00007fcfbff25000)
	libcufft.so.8.0 => /usr/local/lib/libcufft.so.8.0 (0x00007fcfb70d6000)
	libcublas.so.8.0 => /usr/local/lib/libcublas.so.8.0 (0x00007fcfb463e000)
	libmkl_intel_lp64.so => /opt/intel/mkl/lib/intel64/libmkl_intel_lp64.so (0x00007fcfb3b0d000)
	libmkl_gnu_thread.so => /opt/intel/mkl/lib/intel64/libmkl_gnu_thread.so (0x00007fcfb22d4000)
	libmkl_core.so => /opt/intel/mkl/lib/intel64/libmkl_core.so (0x00007fcfae19b000)
	libgomp.so.1 => /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgomp.so.1 (0x00007fcfadf79000)

@ezyang hello, Thanks for your reply! but I am definitely sure that my C++ code runs on the GPU. Because the executable file has linked into such deep learning acceleration libraries as cuda, cudnn , etc.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
